title: Laro ng Lahi
paragraph: A set of illustrations for an article of theAsianParent Philippnes. Article by former Mega Magazine Editor-in-chief, Carla Perlas.

cards.title: Laro ng Lahi
cards.paragraph: Though I'm already a Developer for the team, I was tapped to do an illustration for an articles as a celebration of National Traditions Month.

cards.title: Wriiten by Carla 'Lacar' Perlas
cards.paragraph: Article was written by former Regional Chief Editor for theAsianParent and former Editor-In-Chief of Smart Parenting Magazine

cards.title: More
cards.paragraph: I want to do more article illustrations though :D
